entry.title: mixandjam/balatro-feel
entry.summary:
Recreating the basic Game Feel from Balatro

Balatro's Game Feel | Mix and Jam

This is the official respository for the episode #32 of the Mix and Jam Youtube Channel!

Getting Started

These instructions will get you a copy of the project up and running on your local machine for development and testing purposes.

Prerequisites

  • Unity ver. 2022.3 or higher

Running the project

After cloning or downloading the repository, open the root project folder in unity and press the Play button.

You can see a running demo of the project in this video.

Built With

  • DOTween - DOTween is a fast, efficient, fully type-safe object-oriented animation engine for Unity, optimized for C# users, free and open-source, with tons of advanced features

Authors

Game Development

  • Andr√© Cardoso - Github
